PseudoWeb.Net is Nat Welch's log of stuff.

About

Nat Welch is a college student at Cal Poly and a software developer for iFixit in San Luis Obispo, CA. Nat enjoys learning web development and Linux. He also enjoys backpacking, music, and urban exploration in his free time.
